Waldman I found a true friend. <lb n="c56-0031__main__16"/>His gentleness was never tinged by <seg sID="C09_app33-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0031__main__d5e6142">dg</del> <lb n="c56-0031__main__17"/>dogmatism <seg eID="C09_app33-fMS"/> and his instructions were <lb n="c56-0031__main__18"/>given with an air of frankness and <lb n="c56-0031__main__19"/>good <seg sID="C09_app35-fMS"/> nature <seg eID="C09_app35-fMS"/> that banished ever<sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0031__main__d5e6151"/>y <sga-add eID="c56-0031__main__d5e6151"/>idea <lb n="c56-0031__main__20"/>of <seg sID="C09_app38-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0031__main__d5e6157">pedantl</del> pedantry. <seg eID="C09_app38-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C09_app73-fMS"/> labrotary. <seg eID="C09_app73-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0032__main__1"/>As I applied so closely, it may be <lb n="c56-0032__main__2"/>easily conceived that <seg sID="C09_app75-fMS"/> I improved <w ana="start"/>rapid<lb n="c56-0032__main__3"/>ly<w ana="end"/>. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0032__main__d5e6351">It</del> <seg eID="C09_app75-fMS"/> My ardour was indeed the <w ana="start"/>astonish<lb n="c56-0032__main__4"/>ment<w ana="end"/> of the <seg sID="C09_app77-fMS"/> students, <seg eID="C09_app77-fMS"/> and my <seg sID="C09_app79-fMS"/> proficiency <seg eID="C09_app79-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0032__main__5"/>that of the <seg sID="C09_app81-fMS"/> master. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0032__main__d5e6363">and</del> <seg eID="C09_app81-fMS"/> Professor Krempe <lb n="c56-0032__main__6"/>often asked <seg sID="C09_app83-fMS"/> me <seg eID="C09_app83-fMS"/> with a sly <seg sID="C09_app85-fMS"/> smile <seg eID="C09_app85-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0032__main__7"/>how Cornelius Agrippa went <seg sID="C09_app87-fMS"/> on <mod sID="c56-0032__main__d5e6370"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0032__main__d5e6372"/>; <seg sID="C09_app102-fMS"/> it <seg eID="C09_app102-fMS"/> can conceive <lb n="c56-0032__main__14"/>of the enticements of <seg sID="C09_app104-fMS"/> science– <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0032__main__d5e6422">especially</del> <seg eID="C09_app104-fMS"/> In <lb n="c56-0032__main__15"/>other studies you go as far as others have <seg sID="C09_app106-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0032__main__16"/><mod sID="c56-0032__main__d5e6429"/> <mdel>d</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0032__main__d5e6433"/>g <sga-add eID="c56-0032__main__d5e6433"/><mod eID="c56-0032__main__d5e6429"/> one <seg eID="C09_app106-fMS"/> before <seg sID="C09_app108-fMS"/> you <seg eID="C09_app108-fMS"/> and there is nothing <lb n="c56-0032__main__17"/>more to <seg sID="C09_app110-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0032__main__d5e6440"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0032__main__d5e6442">learn</del> <mdel>,</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0032__main__d5e6447"/>know, <sga-add eID="c56-0032__main__d5e6447"/><mod eID="c56-0032__main__d5e6440"/> learn, <seg eID="C09_app110-fMS"/> but in a scientific <lb n="c56-0032__main__18"/>pursuit <seg sID="C09_app112-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0032__main__d5e6453">their</del> there is continual <lb n="c56-0032__main__19"/>food for discovery and wonder.
